body.name: JOIOT Mini Portable SSD 240GB External Solid State Drive - Up to 540MB/s, USB 3.1 Gen 2 Ultra-Slim External SSD, Blue

features: ▲Transfer Speed - Read and write speed can respectively reach up to 540MB/s and 500MB/s, which enables you to fast back up massive data to the SSD or read data from it.Data transfer speed may vary depending on the user’s PC environment and the types of data being transferred.

▲Mini Design & Lightweight - The SSD is very mini and lightweight, smaller than your palm, and easy to carry around with you; metal-made design makes it more solid and durable, and features fast heat dissipation.

▲ Excellent Performance - The SSD features ultra-fast, stable and secure data transfer, waterproof, shockproof, wear resistant; and it has more excellent performance than common mobile solid state drive, perfect for photographers, gamer, video editors and music producers.
▲Strong Compatibility - The external SSD is compatible with Windows, Mac OS and Android systems, and supports all kinds of PC with USB port, and latest laptops and smartphones with Type-C port.
▲What You Get - 1 * Mini SSD, 1 * Type-A to Type-C Adapter, 1* Type-A to Type-C Data Cable and 12-Month Warranty.
body.description: X2MINI External Solid State Drive Read/Write Speed can respectively reach up to 540 MB/s and 500MB/s. With the size of 2.67x1.47x0.28inch and weighing 1.06 oz. Metal-made casing, makes it more sturdy and durable. Waterproof, shockproof and wear resistant. Supports all PCs with USB port and latest laptops and smartphones with Type-C port. Compatible with multiple systems. TIP:Each storage device has a reserved memory for formatting and other functions. The actual capacity is about 93% of the labeled capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what I need for content creation!
reviews.reviewText: I literaly use this every single day from recording my gameplay videos, or transfering my photos from my phone to my external! This is fast enough to use while editing as well! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I have bought 3 of these (2 250 gig) (1 500gig) they are working great. I have movies on them and connect to my TV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does what it says
reviews.reviewText: My only complaint is the speed. But it makes sense when looking at the price.Works amazing and I have had 0 issues with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A handy, large capacity, mobile backup drive. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money if you don't need more storage.
reviews.reviewText: Using this unit as a live backup on a studio broadcast. The unit is quick enough to capture the live stream and like the activity light on the end. Replaced a unit costing four times as much, as did not need that much capacity. Occasionally dump the contests to a USB Thumbdrive for backup. Now have two of these for backups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't Do It! Don't say I didn't warn ya lol
reviews.reviewText: This drive failed completely after about 3 months! It will just die...no warning or nothing...it will just fail to even show up on your computer. It caused me to loose all the data for a video I was going to release. Yea, u could say I'm slightly upset- Thanks a bunch-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I Can Back-up Data But Can't Create a Back-up Image
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these SSDs hoping that I could back-up to them. They do create a back-up of my data but when it came to the drive image it failed on both drives each one connected to two different computers, so it isn't the computers. I researched the the error message, I/O device error (0x8007045d), and found a Microsoft support page that described the error as a start up program being the problem. I disabled start up programs as the article described and found there weren't any programs that were affecting the drive. I can't find the manufacturers website for support, made in China. I called Amazon and they would replace the drive, refund, or give me courtesy credit, I took the credit and keep the drives as they did work. I have another SSD of a difference manufacturer and that drive will create an image, so I used the credit to purchase another Crucial drive from Amazon.Cables are an issue with both drive manufactures. JOIOT has a USB a to USB c and a USB c to USB a adapter, the cables are just a few inches long. I purchased 3 new 1.5 foot cables adding another 10 dollars to the cost of the drives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for pocket storage
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I have thumb drives with this amount of storage, but this is faster. And it's actually less expensive than said thumb drives. And it works as OTG connected to my phone. Fits easily in the pocket. It does heat up with continuous use, so I won't leave it permanently plugged in. Very happy with this one.
